root.name: King Arthur & the Knights of Justice
root.description: King Arthur and the Knights of Justice was a game released by Enix in 1993 to capitalize on the cartoon series of the same name and premise. Gameplay In King Arthur and the Knights of Justice, you control any 3 of a dozen fighters available at the start, all of which have different fighting abilities. You control the knights from a top down perspective and explore a world, finding and defeating 12 bosses to get 12 keys which you need to access the game's final sequence, unlocking different areas of the map as you go. Playable Knights Arthur KingLanceTrunkBreezeToneWallyGallopDarrenLugZekeBrickPhil
